gets the job title of co-founder and will work on strategic projects and products. "For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions," Eric Schmidt wrote. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt wrote. The change over indicates there's been a clear decision to put a technologist back in charge and to return some of the founding drive to strategic and day-to-day decisions, given Page's role

Around 1,000 people scaled the walls on the museum's eastern side on Friday, according to Zahi Hawass , secretary general of the Supreme Council of Antiquities. They went into the Late Period gallery, but when they found no gold, they broke thirteen vitrines and threw the antiquities on the floor, Zahi Hawass said on his blog.
